hero.name: Jigglypuff/Dragonite/Dugtrio
hero.specialAbility: Only 1 hero is in play at a time. When a hero is defeated or Switched, remove it from the game and replace it with a hero who is not yet defeated. [Start Health; Jigglypuff: 5, Dragonite: 10, Dugtrio: 5]

cards.title: Feint
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent’s card.

cards.title: Regroup
cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.

cards.title: Momentous Shift
cards.duringText: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card’s value is 5 instead.

cards.title: Skirmish
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

cards.title: Tackle
cards.afterText: Move this fighter up to 3 spaces. Draw 1 card. Switch your hero.

cards.title: Double-Edge
cards.duringText: This fighter may choose to take 2 damage. If they do, this card's value is 7 instead. You may not do this if it would defeat this fighter.

cards.title: U-Turn
cards.afterText: You may switch your hero. If you do, deal 1 damage to the other fighter.

cards.title: Super Potion
cards.basicText: The active hero heals 2 health. Then switch your hero.

cards.title: Exp Share
cards.basicText: For each hero that is not defeated other than the active hero, add 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.title: Sing
cards.basicText: Place 2 Sleep tokens on the space with any fighter in Jigglypuff's zone. Fighters on the same space as sleep tokens cannot take any actions. When that fighter would move from Maneuver they must instead remove a Sleep token.

cards.title: Multiscale
cards.duringText: If Dragonite's health is 10, it takes no damage from this attack.

cards.title: Outrage
cards.afterText: Deal 1 damage to all adjacent opposing fighters.

cards.title: Dig
cards.afterText: If Dugtrio won the combat, move them up to 2 spaces, then deal 1 damage to an adjacent fighter.

cards.title: Fissure
cards.basicText: Choose a fighter adjacent to Dugtrio. If that fighter has 3 or less health, that fighter is defeated.
